name: The Scoopy Shooty Game
description:
Hey what are you reading this for? You have ice creams to make... The customers are waiting! Get behind the cannon and get those orders filled.

Our entry into the Last Minute Change Jam with the theme of "Stuck Together". The last minute change was the addition of a second theme "Everything Falls Apart".

Let us know what you think of the game! Leave a comment.

How to Play:

To complete customer orders, pick flavours to match their requests. Click and drag anywhere to aim cannon and control velocity. Release to fire.

Mess up an order? Don't worry, you can restart - use the eject button to blow your ice cream apart.

Credits:

Game by: Anthony, Corey, and Jon

Music from Bensound.com
